content: Greg Jarboe from SEO-PR Answers Questions at SEOChat Online Advertising By: Rand Fishkin June 30, 2005 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin June 30, 2005 Greg Jarboe from SEO-PR Answers Questions at SEOChat Online Advertising The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I've asked Greg Jarboe of SEO-PR.com, with whom I spoke on the link building panel at SES Toronto, to stop by SEOChat and answer some of the members' questions. Luckily for us, Greg has a couple of spare minutes today and will be taking questions and providing responses. This is a great opportunity to learn more about: Press Releases for SEO Google & Yahoo!'s News Services Syndication & Release of News Items on the Web The thread - Q+A with Greg Jarboe of SEO-PR.com is now open and I've posted some early questions myself. Big thanks to Greg for his quick acceptance and willingness to get out into the community. Copied! Back to Top
